Package farm

Class Farm

java.lang.Object
farm.Farm
public class Farm extends Object
Farm class - a collection of 1 or more crops - Can perform add crop, remove crop, retrieve 1 or all crops - Can perform watering, pest control, update growth stage Name: Leong Hean Luen Student ID: SUKD2301060 Course: Bachelor of Information Technology (BIT) Subject: TCS3064 - OOP Date: 22/08/2023
Author:
Hean Luen
